Articles.Content: When I go to Orbit Map and add a maneuver, when I go back to the ship screen I have no thruster capabilities (this happens also when I time warp to get the right launch window I want) I have windows 7 64 bit. I have to actually quit the game and go back in, any suggestions?
Did you run out of electricity? You need a power source on an unmanned probe for it to work. Just go back and add some solar panels or RTGs.
